tagline: We aim to bring a change in the field of agriculture by efficient combination of technologies like artificial intelligence with IOT and modern farming techniques.

products.title: Agriculture Products
products.content: Agrivator provides fresh and safe to eat produce from 'farm to fork', sourced from clusters of farms under Agrivator across Kerala.

testimonials.name: Bob the farmer
testimonials.content: Agrivator is literally one of the greatest things I’ve ever discovered. Thank you so much for making it so easy.

vision.title: Infuse agriculture with technology
vision.content: To bring out a revolutionary change through product development which can ramp up crop growth and harvest with minimal resources and capital

vision.title: Boost income of our farmers
vision.content: Make sure farmers get their deserved remuneration

vision.title: Quality rich produce
vision.content: For the society,to get rid of pesticides and other life threatening chemicals that we get to tuck-in today
